How to find it?

map:

https://maps.google.com/maps?q=MIT+sloan&ie=UTF-8&hl=en&authuser=0

direction:

After you take off Kendall T station, walk towards the bridge to Boston, and you will see a building on your right side with a huge raised lawn in front of it. That is the MIT building. We will be using a empty classroom on the second floor left wing.

 

Do you want to get better at the four tones of Mandarin? Are you new to Mandarin and find speaking the four tones challenging? Do you want to sound more like a native? Sophia and Ben are hosting this intonation improvement workshop. We will evaluate how good your intonations are and will also have exercises for you and help you on a one-on-one basis.

You can be a total beginner with few vocabulary. This workshop can help you start speaking Mandarin on the right note so you don't have to correct yourself down the road.

If you are native speaker and you want to help out, you are welcome to show up too.

NOTE: If you can't attend this particular event and would like help to improve your intonation, you can private message me  to make separate appointment.
